Live Video Mixing

Real-time Visual Performance & VJ Sets

Live video mixing and real-time visual performance systems for events, concerts, and installations. These setups combine multiple video sources, effects processing, and live control interfaces to create dynamic visual experiences that respond to music and audience energy.

Mixing Components

The essential elements that create compelling live video mixing performances.

Multi-source Input

Seamless integration of multiple video sources including cameras, computers, and media players for diverse content.

Real-time Effects

Live processing and effects application including transitions, filters, and generative elements.

Performance Control

Intuitive control interfaces and MIDI controllers for expressive live performance and real-time manipulation.

Audio-Visual Sync

Tight synchronization between audio and visual elements, creating cohesive audio-visual experiences.

Mixing Philosophy

"Live video mixing is about creating visual music - responding to the energy of the moment and crafting experiences that enhance and amplify the emotional impact of live performance."

My approach to live video mixing focuses on creating seamless, responsive visual experiences that complement and enhance live music and events. Each performance is unique, blending prepared content with spontaneous creative decisions to match the energy of the moment.
